snippet.title: Valheim: Ashlands Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The fire ignites... Are you prepared to conquer Valheim's most challenging biome yet?

Please keep in mind that this is a gameplay trailer, and will obviously not be spoiler free! While you're waiting for the premiere, please also take a look at our Ashlands Preparation Guide: https://valheim.com/support/getting-ready-for-the-ashlands

Valheim is available with PC Game Pass, or for purchase on the Steam, Microsoft/Xbox and Humble stores.

Valheim is made by developer Iron Gate, published by Coffee Stain Publishing.

Find us on:
https://www.valheim.com
https://www.youtube.com/@irongateofficial 
https://twitter.com/Valheimgame
https://discord.com/invite/Valheim
https://www.tiktok.com/@valheimofficial
https://www.facebook.com/valheimgame
https://www.instagram.com/valheim_official
https://www.reddit.com/r/valheim/
https://www.twitch.tv/irongatestudio
